titleStmt.title: Gus. L. Burke to Thomas A. Theobald
CWG13762

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 - Expenses to Recruit & Equip Incl. Related Correspondence

body.p:
Falmouth Ky March 3rd/64
Thos. A. Theobald Esqr
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir
Please advise me at your earliest Convenience whether the q. m. Genl has any friends on hand yet or not I have Some claims which I would like to get adjusted
Have you got Blanks yet from Cincinnati, and how does the agency business open up? I should be pleased to hear from you occasionally

Yours Respectfully
Gus, L, Burke
Genl Agent in Ky
for H & C
Washington D. C.
